name: Notion AI Crash Course
description: Supercharge your productivity with your own personal AI assistant!This short Notion AI crash course will walk you through from getting access to the Notion AI all the way to using the custom AI prompt blocks.Will update the course over time as Notion releases more AI updates and as I discover more about using the Notion AI. How does it work?Pay what you feel is fair (enter "0" to get it for free) Complete the checkout process and you'll be redirected to the product pageBefore you click on the li
features: Pay what you feel is fair (enter "0" to get it for free); Complete the checkout process and you'll be redirected to the product page; Before you click on the link make sure to give this product a rating; Open the Notion link and click duplicate in the top right corner; Or you can just bookmark the link and use it like a website; Enjoy the course and play around with the Notion AI
